            <div class="Grid Grid--withGutter">
              <div class="Grid-cell">
                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/AnawarMiah" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Anawar Miah</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/AnawarMiah">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">AnawarMiah</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Barrister of the Honourable Society of Lincoln's Inn. Labour Parliamentary Candidate Welwyn Hatfield 2015 &amp; 2017.</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              Hatfield Hertfordshire

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">  <a class="u-textUserColor" target="_blank" rel="me nofollow noopener" href="https://t.co/GXE5BtyvLE" title="http://www.anawar.co.uk">
    anawar.co.uk
  </a>

</span>
      </div>


      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDate">
        <span class="Icon Icon--calendar Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-joinDateText js-tooltip u-dir" dir="ltr" title="9:07 am - 21 Jun 2014">Joined June 2014</span>
      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Just been revealed that the private companies running the East Coast Line have failed and the taxpayer will have to pick up a bill of up to 2bn.

We must end the scandal of privatisation of our railways and bring them into public ownership so they work for the many, not the few.<a href="https://t.co/tx0GPAsBYs" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/tx0GPAsBYs</a></p>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="936554133632536576" id="stream-item-tweet-936554133632536576" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;936554133632536576&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I love that I live in a city where I, a Jewish journalist, can receive a card from the Muslim Mayor of London, wishing me a "joyful Christmas".

Seriously, screw all the racists and the haters. London is a thriving multicultural city and long may it remain so.<a href="https://t.co/Db9ZN7Gipl" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Db9ZN7Gipl</a></p>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="909418004089360384" id="stream-item-tweet-909418004089360384" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;909418004089360384&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/jeremycorbyn" data-user-id="117777690">

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/SkyNews" data-user-id="7587032">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/jeremycorbyn" data-user-id="117777690">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Jeremy Corbyn</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>jeremycorbyn</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">If I lose just six seats I will lose this election and Jeremy Corbyn will be sitting down to negotiate with Europe: <a href="https://t.co/OwbfDseOJh" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.facebook.com/TheresaMayOfficial/posts/1737355726281193" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://www.facebook.com/TheresaMayOfficial/posts/1737355726281193"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">facebook.com/TheresaMayOffi</span><span class="invisible">cial/posts/1737355726281193</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  </span>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Gary Lineker Retweeted The Independent</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">They're trying to stop you reading about Dementia Tax. That's Dementia Tax. Dementia Tax? Think about that for a minute. Dementia Tax.<a href="https://t.co/Svf3U1GKvD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/independent/status/866569875027886080" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/independent/status/866569875027886080"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/independent/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/866569875027886080</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Jeremy Corbyn Retweeted Danny Baker</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Couldn't agree more, thanks Danny <a href="https://t.co/bZbUbyS06E" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/prodnose/status/865324197408636928" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/prodnose/status/865324197408636928"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/prodnose/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/865324197408636928</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Jeremy Corbyn added,</p>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/UKLabour" data-user-id="14291684">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Ian Duncan Smith has gone but Osborne was the architect of this disgraceful attack on disabled people and must also go.</p>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="658399880071815168" data-item-id="658399880071815168" data-permalink-path="/Sharonavraham/status/658399880071815168" data-conversation-id="658399880071815168" data-tweet-nonce="658399880071815168-b4bee5ed-360c-4860-ae3c-b86b5de7292e" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="658410731629580288" data-retweeter="AnawarMiah" data-screen-name="Sharonavraham" data-name="SharonAvraham" data-user-id="41574937" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="Telegraph" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;41574937&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Sharonavraham&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;SharonAvraham&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;SharonAvraham&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;SharonAvraham&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2580676778&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AnawarMiah&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;16343974&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;Telegraph&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;The Telegraph&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;The Telegraph&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;The Telegraph&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/UKLabour" data-user-id="14291684">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/948955285862920193/bCUl6VHS_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

    <div class="dropdown">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tomorrow's front pages show British press at partisan worst. All pretence of separation between news and opinion gone, even in "qualities".</p>

</div>


    

    

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

  </div>



    
<div class="dismiss-module">
  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">
        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>

  </div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Join us on our mass campaign in Welwyn Hatfield tomorrow from 10 till 4. Text 07547 208 555 for details.<a href="http://t.co/aBZZ1soWBo" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/aBZZ1soWBo</a></p>
</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="590263727284424707" id="stream-item-tweet-590263727284424707" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;590263727284424707&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="590280519213953026" data-item-id="590280519213953026" data-permalink-path="/DailyMirror/status/590280519213953026" data-conversation-id="590280519213953026" data-tweet-nonce="590280519213953026-62825ef2-a01a-4a20-a5d6-9c98b9e016a9" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="590360302400733184" data-retweeter="AnawarMiah" data-screen-name="DailyMirror" data-name="Daily Mirror" data-user-id="16887175" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;16887175&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;DailyMirror&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Daily Mirror&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Daily Mirror&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Daily Mirror&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2580676778&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AnawarMiah&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/David_Cameron" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="103065157"><s>@</s><b>David_Cameron</b></a> I believe my plan can give this country a better future than yours. Disagree? Prove it - debate me &amp; let the people decide.</p>
</div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

</div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="587906137955045376" id="stream-item-tweet-587906137955045376" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;587906137955045376&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="587906137955045376" data-item-id="587906137955045376" data-permalink-path="/UKLabour/status/587906137955045376" data-conversation-id="587906137955045376" data-tweet-nonce="587906137955045376-8f693b1b-ab15-4fdd-8062-8b02f35abdb9" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="587909114426195969" data-retweeter="AnawarMiah" data-screen-name="UKLabour" data-name="The Labour Party" data-user-id="14291684" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14291684&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;UKLabour&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2580676778&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AnawarMiah&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary" data-has-cards="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">There is nothing in our manifesto that requires additional borrowing. Unlike the Tories, every Labour policy is paid for.</p>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">
        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">17</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">17</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="585723728253865985" data-item-id="585723728253865985" data-permalink-path="/AndrewSparrow/status/585723728253865985" data-conversation-id="585723728253865985" data-tweet-nonce="585723728253865985-abc12eb1-74a6-4774-99a9-55c0ffe683e5" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="585724855565320193" data-retweeter="AnawarMiah" data-screen-name="AndrewSparrow" data-name="AndrewSparrow" data-user-id="15778426" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;15778426&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AndrewSparrow&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;AndrewSparrow&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;AndrewSparrow&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;AndrewSparrow&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2580676778&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AnawarMiah&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I bet Cameron is regretting insisting on this format. He looks diminished, tired and ordinary.</p>
</div>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">PoliticsHome</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>politicshome</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">If youre a fan of Martin Freeman, I think youll like this video he's made on the choice on offer at this election<a href="https://t.co/Y17lj1mF3W" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JbHNVtsAD2M" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JbHNVtsAD2M"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">youtube.com/watch?v=JbHNVt</span><span class="invisible">sAD2M</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="582128250991849472" id="stream-item-tweet-582128250991849472" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;582128250991849472&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="581915822714667008" data-item-id="581915822714667008" data-permalink-path="/itvnews/status/581915822714667008" data-conversation-id="581915822714667008" data-tweet-nonce="581915822714667008-d6d2dbdc-fc04-4c88-ac78-dd9de3cbc3dd" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="581921045369720832" data-retweeter="AnawarMiah" data-screen-name="itvnews" data-name="ITV News" data-user-id="21866939" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;21866939&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;itvnews&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;ITV News&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;ITV News&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;ITV News&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;2580676778&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AnawarMiah&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Anawar Miah&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Campaigning in Welwyn Hatfield. My home. A place for which I have a great vision. Pls support. <a href="/hashtag/LabourDoorstep?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LabourDoorstep</b></a><a href="http://t.co/Y6zI0emJ71" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Y6zI0emJ71</a></p>

      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>

  <ul>

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>

      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I know, I know. Bill Thomas, our Small Business Taskforce Chair, will never forgive me. It's an age thing! <a href="/NewsNight" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="17793221"><s>@</s><b>Newsnight</b></a></p>

</div>


    

    

  </div>

    </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So a 12 % ish turnout for police  elections is legitimate but a 40% turnout by a union would not be? Mmm !<a href="http://t.co/5z4VYVnFxS" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-30747185" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-30747185"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politi</span><span class="invisible">cs-30747185</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

    </div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Our economic plan: Sensible reductions in spending, not the Tory slash and burn of public services.</p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/Ed_Miliband" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="61781260"><s>@</s><b>Ed_Miliband</b></a> makes it clear that <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> will tax bankers bonuses to get kids back into work. <a href="/hashtag/BitetheBallot?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BitetheBallot</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/YesEd?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>YesEd</b></a></p>

      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">While the Tories abdicate responsibility for climate change, the next Labour govt will lead on it.<a href="http://t.co/4mILIoDw3P" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.independent.co.uk/voices/comment/saving-the-planet-is-about-leadership-not-fashion-mr-cameron-9908345.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.independent.co.uk/voices/comment/saving-the-planet-is-about-leadership-not-fashion-mr-cameron-9908345.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">independent.co.uk/voices/comment</span><span class="invisible">/saving-the-planet-is-about-leadership-not-fashion-mr-cameron-9908345.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">19</span>
  </span>

  </button>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
